title: AI Fake Review Detector
description: Detect fake product reviews using AI-powered analysis. Identify suspicious patterns, get trust scores, and make informed buying decisions.

productUrl.title: Product URL
productUrl.description: URL of the product page to analyze reviews from (e.g., Amazon, eBay, or any e-commerce site)

reviews.title: Reviews (Manual Input)
reviews.description: Alternatively, paste reviews directly as an array of objects with 'text' field. Example: [{"text": "Great product!"}]

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
openaiApiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key for AI-powered analysis. If not provided, basic pattern detection will be used.

maxReviews.title: Maximum Reviews to Analyze
maxReviews.description: Maximum number of reviews to analyze (to control costs)
